description: Digital Object Identifier for the record.
Landing page URL provided by DataCite.
Entity responsible for publishing/hosting the record.
Language of the record (IETF code or free text).
Version label for the record (if any).
Metadata schema version used by the repository.

notes: If attributes.prefix is missing, derived from DOI string before first slash.
If provider missing, may infer provider as the part before the first dot.

source_path: relationships.provider.data.id OR attributes.providerId OR parsed from client_id
notes: If not provided, derived from client_id prefix before first dot.
Examples: Text, Dataset, Software, Image, Collection.

description: Record creation date normalized to date.
notes: Normalized from ISO; if time zone present, converted to date in UTC.

description: DOI registration date normalized to date.
Last metadata update date normalized to date.
Published date as provided (can be year or freeform).
notes: May not be ISO date; use published_year when available.

description: Outbound references listed by the repository.

notes: Not widely populated in many repositories.
